Posts.Content:
My mom was diagnosed 2 yrs ago with breast cancer. they removed part of her breast and lymph nodes. on 5/14/09 they told her the cance was bake and has spread to her brain, liver, lungs, bones, they did brain surgery and removed a tumur the size of a lemon, my question is what is her prognosis, how long will i have my mom. we are very close i dont know what to do.
Any information would be most appreciated. thank you
Posts.Title: my mom has cancer>(
